## pivot longer

```{r import}
pulse_df <- read_sas("data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()

pulse_df
```

```{r tidy_1}
pulse_df <-
  pulse_df %>%
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    values_to = "bdi"
  )
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
